ground_truth: On stage, a band who wears seahorses on their heads performs, and Carl turns to look as Allison walks onstage. Carl shakes his head incredulously as Allison plays a keyboard, wearing a spangly mini top hat. Carl stands with his hand on his heart, grins, and gazes at her. She pouts at the crowd, then furrows her brow. Carl sits at the bar with a bottle of beer, and smiling, Allison sashays up beside him. Carl sits at the bar, smiling and waiting as she glances over and beams. He looks down, and later they walk in the middle of a dark street, reach her scooter, and wrinkling her nose, she smiles as they both smile. Carl throws himself into bed and sets an alarm clock, which he then puts on his bedside table and switches off his lamp. He scowls at his phone, answers it, and switches the lamp on again. Early morning joggers stretch in front of a large observatory with three domes as a car races up the hill and comes to a halt. Carl climbs out, cans of energy drinks tumbling out when he opens the door, and he removes a can stuck to his shoe. He runs over, punches the air, bounds off, and sprints down a hill with the others jogging behind. They take snaps on their cameras while Carl leaps onto a bench by a couple hugging, snaps them with his phone, then darts off again. The group jog along a pathway on a hillside and find Carl collapsed on the ground, his eyes closed. Allison squats to start snapping Carl, and everyone else does the same. Allison and Carl stand together at the top of the hill as Carl downs a bottle of water, gasps in air, pretends to write notes, and nods thoughtfully. She slaps him across the arm. Carl and Peter eat in the garden of a restaurant, where Carl downs a glass of water. A Persian woman is present, and Carl picks up a basket that Peter's food was in. Peter stands to kiss Lucy, and they sit while Faranoush beams at her, and Lucy stares, flabbergasted. Norman opens his front door, and they're dressed as Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The others stare as guests play a game of mock Quidditch, and Carl smiles. The first Harry Potter film plays, and Norman gazes at the screen and waves. Carl and Allison stand up to leave, and Carl freezes as the party guests clap. Norman lets them out, and Carl and Allison zoom down a dark street on Allison's scooter, with Carl sitting behind her with his arms around her waist. The scooter wobbles unsteadily as Carl is driving, and he smiles nervously, eyes something on the other side of the street, and grins. Carl and Allison hurry towards a chain-link fence that has a gate which is locked.

Allison and Carl stand together at the summit of the slope as Carl downs a bottle of water, gasps in air, pretends to draft notes, and nods thoughtfully. She slaps him across the arm. Peter stands to kiss Lucy, and they sit while Faranoush beams at her, and Lucy stares, astonished. Norman opens his front door, and they're dressed as Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The bed is thrown into by Carl, and an alarm clock is set by him, put on his bedside table, and his lamp is switched off. His phone is scowled at, answered, and his lamp is switched on again. Early morning joggers are stretching in front of a large observatory with three domes as a car races up the hill and halts. Carl climbs out, and cans of energy drinks tumble out when the door is opened by him, and a can stuck to his shoe is removed. The air is punched by him as he runs over, and bounding off, a hill is sprinted down by him with the others jogging behind. Snaps on their cameras are taken while a bench is leaped onto by Carl by a couple hugging, and they are snapped with his phone, then he darts off again. A pathway on a hillside is jogged along by the group, and Carl is found collapsed on the ground, his eyes are closed. Allison squats to start snapping Carl, and the same is done by everyone else. Allison and Carl stand together at the top of the hill as a bottle of water is downed by Carl, air is gasped in, notes are pretended to be written, and thoughtfully, he nods. His arm is slapped across by her. In the garden of a restaurant, Carl and Peter are eating, where a glass of water is downed by Carl. A Persian woman is present, and a basket that Peter's food was in is picked up by Carl. Peter stands to kiss Lucy, and while they are sitting, Faranoush beams at her, and she stares, flabbergasted. His front door is opened by Norman, and they're dressed as Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The others stare as a game of mock Quidditch is played by guests, and Carl smiles. The scooter wobbles unsteadily as Carl drives, and something on the other side of the street is eyed by him, and he grins. Carl and Allison hurry towards a chain-link fence that has a gate which they find locked.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: On stage, a band with seahorses on their heads performs as Carl watches Allison walk onstage. Carl shakes his head as Allison plays the keyboard, wearing a spangly mini top hat. Carl stands with his hand on his heart, grinning. She pouts at the audience, then frowns. Carl sits at the bar with beer, and Allison sashays up beside him. He waits as she glances over and beams. They walk on a dark street, reach her scooter, and smile. Carl falls into bed, sets an alarm, places it on the nightstand, and switches off the lamp. He scowls at his phone, answers it, and turns the lamp on again. Morning joggers stretch before an observatory as a car races up and stops. Carl gets out, energy drink cans falling, and he removes one stuck to his shoe. He runs, punches the air, sprints down the hill with others jogging behind. They take photos while Carl leaps onto a bench, snaps a couple, and darts off. The group jogs on a hillside path and finds Carl collapsed. Allison and others start snapping photos. Allison and Carl stand atop the hill; Carl downs water, gasps, pretends to write notes, and nods. She slaps his arm. Carl and Peter eat at a restaurant's garden, with Carl downing water. A Persian woman is present; Carl takes Peter's food basket. Peter kisses Lucy, and they sit while Faranoush beams, and Lucy is flabbergasted. Norman opens the door; they're dressed as Harry, Ron, and Hermione. Others stare as guests play mock Quidditch, and Carl smiles. The first Harry Potter film plays, and Norman waves. Carl and Allison stand to leave, Carl freezes as guests clap. Norman lets them out, and Carl and Allison zoom down a dark street on her scooter, with Carl's arms around her waist. The scooter wobbles as Carl drives, smiles nervously, eyes something across the street, and grins. They hurry towards a locked gate in a chain-link fence.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: On stage, a band with seahorse headgear plays as Carl watches Allison enter. Carl shakes his head as she plays the keyboard, wearing a sparkly mini top hat, and gazes at her. She pouts at the crowd, frowns, and then joins Carl at the bar, smiling. Later, they walk on a dark street to her scooter, smiling. Carl collapses into bed, sets an alarm, and switches off a lamp, but answers his phone, turning the lamp back on. In the morning, joggers stretch by an observatory as Carl arrives, energy drink cans spilling from his car. He joins the joggers, takes photos with his phone, and sprints to collapse on the ground. Allison and the group snap photos of Carl. Carl stands with Allison at the hilltop, drinks, takes notes, and gets playfully hit by her. Carl and Peter eat at a garden restaurant with a Persian woman. Peter kisses Lucy, and they sit while Faranoush smiles. Norman opens the door dressed in Harry Potter costumes, and Carl watches mock Quidditch. The film plays, Norman waves, and Carl and Allison leave. They ride down a dark street on Allison's scooter; Carl drives, smiles nervously, and grins at something across the street. They rush to a locked chain-link fence gate.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
On the lively stage, a band adorned with seahorses perched proudly atop their heads delivers a spirited performance, while Carl turns his attention this way just as Allison makes her entrance onto the stage. Carl shakes his head in disbelief as he watches Allison confidently play the keyboard, all the while sporting a spangly mini top hat that twinkles under the stage lights. Carl stands with his hand placed over his heart, grinning broadly as he gazes admiringly at her. She pouts playfully at the crowd, then furrows her brow, adding a touch of drama to her performance. Later, Carl finds himself seated at the bar, casually sipping a bottle of beer, when the ever-smiling Allison sashays over to him. Carl remains seated at the bar, a grin on his face as he waits patiently, watching her glance his way before she beams brightly. He momentarily lowers his gaze, and in the later hours of the night, they stroll through the dimly lit street, eventually reaching her scooter. Wrinkling her nose in amusement, she smiles warmly, and the two share a moment of shared happiness as their smiles meet. 

Carl then hurls himself into his bed, setting an alarm clock before placing it deliberately on the bedside table, and swiftly switches off the lamp. Suddenly, he scowls at his phone, answers it with frustration, and turns the lamp back on once more. Early in the morning, joggers engage in stretches in front of a grand observatory with three towering domes as a car speeds up the hill and screeches to a halt. Carl climbs out awkwardly, with cans of energy drinks spilling out as he opens the door, and he awkwardly removes a can that’s amusingly stuck to his shoe. He rushes over energetically, pumping his fist into the air as he bounds off, sprinting down the hill energetically with the others jogging behind him. They pause to capture photos on their cameras, while Carl exuberantly leaps onto a bench next to a couple who are hugging, quickly snaps their picture with his phone, then darts away with haste. The group jogs along a pathway winding on a hillside, only to find Carl collapsed dramatically on the ground, his eyes shut. Allison squats down to start taking pictures of Carl, and soon everyone around follows her lead. 

Standing together at the top of the hill, Carl and Allison share a moment as Carl gulp down a bottle of water, gasping for air, pretending to write notes, and then nodding thoughtfully. With a playful gesture, she slaps him lightly across the arm. Later on, Carl and Peter dine in the garden of a restaurant, where Carl rapidly consumes a glass of water. A Persian woman makes her presence felt, as Carl picks up the basket that Peter's food had been in. Peter stands, leaning in to kiss Lucy, and they sit down while Faranoush beams warmly at her, as Lucy stares back, utterly flabbergasted by the scene. In another scene, Norman opens the front door, revealing him and others dressed up as the iconic Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The group gazes as guests partake in a lively game of mock Quidditch, and Carl can’t help but smile. The first Harry Potter film plays softly in the background, and Norman watches the screen with admiration, offering a friendly wave. 

Carl and Allison stand up, preparing to leave, when Carl freezes momentarily as the party guests begin to clap enthusiastically. Norman sees them out, and Carl and Allison swiftly zoom down the dimly lit street on Allison's trusty scooter, with Carl securely sitting behind her, wrapping his arms around her waist for support. The scooter wobbles slightly in an unsteady manner as Carl takes over the driving, smiling nervously while his eyes flicker toward something on the opposite side of the street, and he grins with amusement. With urgency in their steps, Carl and Allison hurry towards a chain-link fence that stands tall, its gate firmly locked, presenting an unexpected obstacle.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
On the bustling, lively stage, a band, creatively adorned with whimsical seahorses perched proudly atop their heads, delivers an incredibly spirited and engaging performance. At this exact moment, Carl turns his attentive gaze in this direction just as Allison makes her grand entrance onto the vibrant stage. Carl, in a state of disbelief, shakes his head while he watches Allison confidently play the keyboard with great skill, all the while sporting a spangly mini top hat that twinkles enchantingly under the bright stage lights. Carl stands with his hand placed over his heart, grinning broadly as he gazes admiringly at her with evident admiration. She pouts playfully at the enthusiastic crowd, then furrows her brow, adding an extra touch of drama and flair to her captivating performance. Later on, Carl finds himself seated comfortably at the bar, casually sipping from a cold bottle of beer, when the ever-smiling and vibrant Allison sashays over to him with a joyful demeanor. Carl remains seated at the bar, a grin plastered on his face as he waits patiently, watching her glance his way with a bright beam. He momentarily lowers his gaze, and in the later hours of the night, they stroll leisurely together through a dimly lit street, eventually reaching her scooter. Wrinkling her nose in amusement, she smiles warmly, and the two share a fleeting moment of shared happiness as their smiles meet in perfect harmony.

Carl then hurls himself onto his bed with a sense of urgency, setting an alarm clock before placing it deliberately on the bedside table, and swiftly switches off the bedside lamp. Suddenly, he scowls at his phone, answering it with a hint of frustration, and turns the lamp back on once more. Early in the morning, joggers are seen engaging in stretches in front of a grand observatory with three towering domes, as a car speeds rapidly up the hill and screeches to a halt in a dramatic fashion. Carl climbs out awkwardly, with numerous cans of energy drinks spilling out as he opens the door, and he awkwardly removes a can that’s amusingly stuck to his shoe. He rushes over energetically, pumping his fist into the air triumphantly as he bounds off, sprinting down the hill energetically alongside the others jogging behind him. They pause momentarily to capture photos on their cameras, while Carl exuberantly leaps onto a bench next to a couple who are hugging, quickly snaps their picture with his phone, and then darts away with great haste. The group jogs along a meandering pathway winding on a hillside, only to stumble upon Carl collapsed dramatically on the ground, his eyes firmly shut. Allison squats down to start taking pictures of Carl, and soon everyone around her follows her lead, snapping shots with enthusiasm.

Standing together at the top of the hill, Carl and Allison share a moment of camaraderie as Carl gulps down a bottle of water, gasping for air, pretending to write notes in an exaggerated manner, and then nodding thoughtfully. With a playful gesture, she slaps him lightly across the arm. Later on, Carl and Peter dine casually in the charming garden of a restaurant, where Carl rapidly consumes a refreshing glass of water. A Persian woman makes her presence felt, catching Carl's attention as he picks up the basket that Peter's food had been in. Peter stands, leaning in to kiss Lucy affectionately, and they both sit down while Faranoush beams warmly at her, as Lucy stares back, utterly flabbergasted by the unexpected scene. In another scene, Norman opens the front door, revealing himself and others dressed up as the iconic characters of Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The group gazes in awe as guests partake in a lively game of mock Quidditch, and Carl can’t help but smile at the sight. The first Harry Potter film plays softly in the background, and Norman watches the screen with admiration, offering a friendly wave to those around him.

Carl and Allison stand up, preparing to leave, when Carl suddenly freezes momentarily as the party guests begin to clap enthusiastically. Norman sees them out graciously, and Carl and Allison swiftly zoom down the dimly lit street on Allison's trusty scooter, with Carl securely sitting behind her, wrapping his arms around her waist for support. The scooter wobbles slightly in an unsteady manner as Carl takes over the driving, smiling nervously while his eyes flicker toward something noticeably on the opposite side of the street, and he grins with amusement. With urgency in their steps, Carl and Allison hurry towards a tall chain-link fence that stands firmly, its gate securely locked, presenting them with an unexpected obstacle to overcome.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: On stage under the spotlight, a band adorned with seahorses perched on their heads captivates the audience with their performance, drawing Carl's attention as he turns to watch Allison make her entrance onto the stage. Carl shakes his head in disbelief, a smile playing on his lips, as Allison, donning a spangly mini top hat, skillfully plays the keyboard. With admiration, Carl stands there with his hand resting on his heart, grinning broadly and gazing intently at her. As she performs, Allison sends a playful pout towards the crowd, then furrows her brow in concentration. The scene shifts to Carl sitting at the bar with a bottle of beer in hand. Allison approaches with a sashay, her smile broadening as she draws near. Carl, immersed in the moment, sits there smiling, waiting expectantly while she glances over at him, her face lighting up with a beam. He momentarily looks down, and later, they are found walking together under the dimly lit street, reaching her scooter. Allison, with a playful wrinkle of her nose, smiles, and they both exchange warm smiles. As the night ends, Carl throws himself onto his bed, setting an alarm clock before placing it on his bedside table and switching off the lamp. Suddenly, he scowls at a ringing phone, answers the call, and switches the lamp back on. As dawn breaks, early morning joggers stretch before a large observatory crowned with three domes, their peaceful routine interrupted by the sound of a car racing up the hill, screeching to a halt. Carl climbs out, cans of energy drinks spilling out as he opens the car door, removing a can that amusingly sticks to his shoe. With enthusiasm, he runs over, punches the air in enthusiasm, and bounds off, sprinting down the hill with the other joggers trailing behind. They gleefully capture moments on their cameras while Carl, brimming with energy, leaps onto a bench by a couple embraced in a hug, snaps a photo with his phone, then darts off once more. The group jogs along a hillside path, eventually discovering Carl sprawled on the ground, his eyes closed in exhaustion. Allison crouches down to snap photos of Carl, soon joined by the rest of the group doing the same. Later, Allison and Carl stand together atop the hill, with Carl gulping down a bottle of water, gasping for air, then pretending to jot down notes, nodding thoughtfully. She playfully slaps him on the arm, and the scene transitions to Carl and Peter dining in the garden of a restaurant, where Carl quickly downs a glass of water. A Persian woman accompanies them, and Carl picks up the basket that previously held Peter's meal. Peter stands, planting a kiss on Lucy, and they sit together while Faranoush beams at her and Lucy stares in astonishment. As evening falls, Norman opens his front door, revealing them all dressed in costumes resembling Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The others gawk as guests indulge in a lively game of mock Quidditch, all the while Carl smiles contentedly. The first Harry Potter film plays on a screen, and Norman, caught up in the moment, gazes at the screen and waves. When the film ends, Carl and Allison stand up to leave, Carl suddenly freezing in place as party guests erupt into applause. Norman courteously lets them out, and they zoom down a dark street on Allison's scooter, Carl perched behind her, his arms wrapped securely around her waist. The scooter wobbles precariously as Carl takes control, smiling nervously while his eyes catch something across the street, prompting a grin. Together, Carl and Allison hurry towards a chain-link fence with a locked gate, their night's adventure lingering in the cool night air.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
On stage, a band with seahorse headgear performs as Carl observes Allison, who joins them playing a keyboard in a spangly mini top hat. Carl, captivated, holds his heart and grins at her while she engages the crowd with expressions. Later at the bar, Allison joins Carl, and they share smiles before leaving together to her scooter, exchanging affectionate looks on a dark street.

At home, Carl sets his alarm before receiving a phone call that prompts him to get up again. Early the next morning, joggers stretch by an observatory as Carl arrives energetically, spilling energy drinks from his car. He joins the joggers, documenting moments on his phone. The group finds Carl playfully collapsed, prompting Allison and others to snap photos of him. At the hilltop, after catching his breath, Carl pretends to jot down notes, earning a playful slap from Allison.

Carl and Peter dine in a restaurant garden, where a Persian woman is present. Peter kisses Lucy, drawing smiles and surprise from others at the table. At Norman's place, guests dressed as Harry Potter characters play mock Quidditch, while Carl enjoys the scene. As a Harry Potter film plays, Norman watches, and Carl and Allison eventually leave together, receiving a round of applause.

They ride down a dark street on Allison's scooter, with Carl holding onto her. As Carl takes over driving, he navigates nervously, spotting something across the street and grinning. Together, they rush towards a locked gate in a chain-link fence.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: On stage, a band who wears seahorses on their heads performs—a nod to their quirky ocean-themed aesthetic—and Carl turns to look as Allison, a well-known local performer, walks onstage. Carl shakes his head incredulously as Allison plays a keyboard, an instrument she mastered at the age of ten, wearing a spangly mini top hat reminiscent of the Roaring Twenties. Carl stands with his hand on his heart, grins, and gazes at her, mesmerized by her stage presence. She pouts at the crowd, known for its discerning taste in music, then furrows her brow. Carl sits at the bar with a bottle of beer, a popular local craft brew, and smiling, Allison sashays up beside him, her signature confident walk. Carl sits at the bar, smiling and waiting as she glances over and beams with the charm that always draws a crowd. He looks down, contemplating their chemistry, and later they walk in the middle of a dark street, known for its vintage lampposts, reach her scooter, and wrinkling her nose, she smiles as they both smile, feeling the night air's refreshing coolness. Carl throws himself into bed and sets an antique alarm clock, a gift from his grandmother, which he then puts on his vintage mahogany bedside table and switches off his retro lamp. He scowls at his phone, seeing a message from his demanding boss, answers it, and switches the lamp on again. Early morning joggers stretch in front of a large observatory with three domes, known as the city's prime stargazing location, as a car races up the hill and comes to a halt. Carl climbs out, cans of energy drinks, a staple for his busy lifestyle, tumbling out when he opens the door, and he removes a can stuck to his shoe, a remnant from his hasty morning routine. He runs over, punches the air, feeling the exhilaration of the early start, bounds off, and sprints down a hill with the others jogging behind, inspired by his energy. They take snaps on their cameras while Carl leaps onto a bench by a couple hugging, capturing the spontaneous moment with his phone, then darts off again with a burst of adrenaline. The group jog along a pathway on a hillside, enjoying the panoramic view of the sunrise, and find Carl collapsed on the ground, his eyes closed, exhausted but content. Allison squats to start snapping Carl, a fond memory in the making, and everyone else does the same, laughing at the tableau. Allison and Carl stand together at the top of the hill as Carl downs a bottle of water, gasps in air, pretends to write notes in a mock-serious manner, and nods thoughtfully. She slaps him across the arm, a playful gesture of affection. Carl and Peter eat in the garden of a restaurant, a popular brunch spot renowned for its seasonal menu, where Carl downs a glass of water to refresh himself. A Persian woman, Faranoush, known for her vibrant storytelling, is present, and Carl picks up a basket that Peter's food was in, appreciating the artistic presentation. Peter stands to kiss Lucy, his longtime girlfriend, and they sit while Faranoush beams at her, and Lucy stares, flabbergasted by the unexpected attention. Norman opens his front door, and they're dressed as Harry, Ron, and Hermione, characters from the globally beloved Harry Potter series. The others stare as guests play a game of mock Quidditch, a magical sport from the series, and Carl smiles, amused by the dedication. The first Harry Potter film, released in 2001, plays, and Norman gazes at the screen and waves nostalgically. Carl and Allison stand up to leave, and Carl freezes as the party guests clap, caught off guard by the spontaneous applause. Norman lets them out, and Carl and Allison zoom down a dark street on Allison's scooter, a bright red Vespa, with Carl sitting behind her with his arms around her waist, feeling the thrill of the ride. The scooter wobbles unsteadily as Carl is driving, unfamiliar with controlling it, and he smiles nervously, eyes something on the other side of the street, a bakery he loves, and grins. Carl and Allison hurry towards a chain-link fence that has a gate which is locked, a typical end to their adventurous night.

High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. Carl and Peter eat in the garden of a restaurant where Carl downs a glass of water. A Persian woman is present and Carl picks up a basket that Peter's food was in. Peter stands to kiss Lucy and they sit while Faranoush beams at her and Lucy stares flabbergasted. Norman opens his front door and they are dressed as Harry Ron and Hermione. The others stare as guests play a game of mock Quidditch and Carl smiles. The first Harry Potter film plays and Norman gazes at the screen and waves. Carl and Allison stand up to leave and Carl freezes as the party guests clap. Norman let us them out and Carl and Allison zoom down a dark street on Allison's scooter with Carl sitting behind her with his arms around her waist. The scooter wobbles unsteadily as Carl is driving and he smiles nervously eyes something on the other side of the street and grins. Carl and Allison hurry towards a chainlink fence that has a gate which is locked.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: On stage a band who wears seahorses on their heads performs and Carl turns to look as Allison walks onstage. Carl shakes his head incredulously as Allison plays a keyboard wearing a spangly mini top hat. Carl stands with his hand on his heart grins and gazes at her. She pouts at the crowd then furrows her brow. Carl sits at the bar with a bottle of beer and smiling. Allison sashays up beside him. Carl sits at the bar smiling and waiting as she glances over and beams. He looks down and later they walk in the middle of a dark street reach her scooter and wrinkling her nose. she smiles as they both smile. Carl throws himself into bed and sets an alarm clock which he then puts on his bedside table and switches off his lamp. He scowls at his phone answers it and switches the lamp on again. Early morning joggers stretch in front of a large observatory with three domes as a car races up the hill and comes to a halt. Carl climbs out cans of energy drinks tumbling out when he opens the door and he removes a can stuck to his shoe. He runs over punches the air bounds off and sprints down a hill with the others jogging behind. They take snaps on their cameras while Carl leaps onto a bench by a couple hugging snaps them with his phone then darts off again. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. The group jog along a pathway on a hillside and find Carl collapsed on the ground his eyes closed. Allison squats to start snapping. Carl and everyone else does the same. Allison and Carl stand together at the top of the hill as Carl downs a bottle of water gasps in air pretends to write notes and nods thoughtfully. She slaps him across the arm. Carl and Peter eat in the garden of a restaurant where Carl downs a glass of water. A Persian woman is present and Carl picks up a basket that Peter's food was in. Peter stands to kiss Lucy and they sit while Faranoush beams at her and Lucy stares flabbergasted. Norman opens his front door and they are dressed as Harry Ron and Hermione. The others stare as guests play a game of mock Quidditch and Carl smiles. The first Harry Potter film plays and Norman gazes at the screen and waves. Carl and Allison stand up to leave and Carl freezes as the party guests clap. Norman let us them out and Carl and Allison zoom down a dark street on Allison's scooter with Carl sitting behind her with his arms around her waist. The scooter wobbles unsteadily as Carl is driving and he smiles nervously eyes something on the other side of the street and grins. Carl and Allison hurry towards a chainlink fence that has a gate which is locked.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: In the forest, an orchestra who wears balloons on their shoes juggles, and Steve spins to nap as Brenda skips underwater. Steve blinks his eyes sleepily as Brenda sketches a violin, sporting a shiny pirate eye patch. Steve plops with his foot on his drum, laughs, and ogles at her. She frowns at the sheep, then twitches her ear. Steve kneels by the piano with a vase of milk, and laughing, Brenda marches down beside him. Steve kneels by the piano, chuckling and pondering as she stares away and giggles. He glances up, and later they hop in the center of a bright meadow, approach her unicycle, and twitching her lips, she giggles as they both giggle. Steve tosses himself onto a couch and hugs a teddy bear, which he then throws on his bookshelf and peels off his gloves. He growls at his mirror, embraces it, and peels the gloves on again. Late night dancers twirl in front of a giant aquarium with five fish tanks as a spaceship glides down the valley and comes to a stop. Steve skips out, piles of socks rolling out when he opens the window, and he pulls a sock fastened to his hat. He skips over, kicks the sky, sways up, and dances up a valley with the others skating behind. They paint portraits with their brushes while Steve sits onto a stump near a pair singing, illustrates them with his chalk, then skips up again. The crowd skate beside a river on a cliffside and discover Steve standing on the roof, his mouth open. Brenda stands to begin sketching Steve, and everybody else mimics the action. Brenda and Steve sit separately at the end of the mountain as Steve sips a mug of lemonade, coughs in bubbles, pretends to doodle equations, and nods dramatically. She knocks him across the elbow. Steve and Roger bake in the courtyard of a temple, where Steve sips a jug of lemonade. A Siamese cat is present, and Steve lifts a basket that Roger's dessert was in. Roger jumps to hug Emily, and they stand while Azar sneers at her, and Emily glares, bewildered. Calvin closes his back gate, and they're dressed as Luke, Leia, and Han. The others gawk as participants solve a puzzle of mock chess, and Steve chuckles. The first Star Wars episode projects, and Calvin stares at the canvas and sings. Steve and Brenda stretch up to snore, and Steve tightens as the audience slumps. Calvin pushes them in, and Steve and Brenda hop down a bright meadow on Brenda's unicycle, with Steve squatting behind her with his feet around her shoulders. The unicycle wobbles uncertainly as Steve is flying, and he laughs anxiously, smells something on the other edge of the meadow, and laughs. Steve and Brenda tiptoe towards a brick wall that has a window which is open.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: On stage, a band with seahorses on their heads performs, and Carl watches as Allison, wearing a spangly mini top hat, plays the keyboard. Carl, captivated, smiles and gazes at her. Later, Carl sits at a bar with Allison, who beams at him. They stroll down a dim street to her scooter, both smiling. Carl goes to bed but is interrupted by a phone call. Early morning joggers stretch by an observatory as Carl arrives in a car filled with energy drinks. He joins the joggers, snapping pictures of a couple before collapsing. Allison and others snap photos of him, and Carl and Allison share a moment at the top of the hill. Carl dines with Peter, witnessing a surprising interaction between Peter, Lucy, and Faranoush. Norman hosts a Harry Potter-themed event, and Carl enjoys the party. Carl and Allison eventually leave, riding down a dark street on her scooter, and Carl nervously drives as they approach a locked chain-link fence.
